vote.text: Amendment SA 3147 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3147 proposed by Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S5348-5353, S5348-5352; text: CR S5348) to provide for attorney's fees.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3147 proposed by Senator Gregg.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3147 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
